arts.ttl: Ipswich 1-1 Man Utd: Player ratings as Ruben Amorim begins Red Devils reign with a draw
arts.sum: Match report and player ratings from Ipswich Town's 1-1 draw with Man Utd.

arts.ttl: New boss Ruben Amorim settles for point on Man Utd debut as Ipswich fight back
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim watched Manchester United play out a 1-1 draw at Ipswich to move up to 12th in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Ipswich Town 1-1 Manchester United: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Omari Hutchinson scores superb equaliser
arts.sum: Man United denied the perfect start to the Ruben Amorim era as Omari Hutchinson-inspired Ipswich Town come from behind to secure 1-1 draw in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Watch the magic moment Ed Sheeran celebrates incredible Ipswich goal as plucky Premier League underdogs look to rain on Ruben Amorim's parade in his first game as Man United boss
arts.sum: Hutchinson is becoming a bit of a long-range specialist as his last six strikes have all come from outside the penalty area. His latest goal certainly got the seal of approval from Sheeran on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Ipswich vs Man United: VAR stopped by fire alarm
arts.sum: VAR was temporarily suspended during Manchester United's clash at Ipswich Town in the Premier League on Sunday after a fire alarm sounded at its Stockley Park control centre.

arts.ttl: VAR stops working during Ipswich vs Manchester United Premier League game: what happens next?
arts.sum: Why did VAR stop working during Ipswich vs Manchester United? Sunday’s Premier League game between Ipswich Town and Manchester United was notable for being Ruben Amorim’s first game in charge of the Red Devils, but also for VAR being unavailable for a short period of time in the first half.

arts.ttl: VAR switched OFF during Ipswich vs Man Utd as fire alarm causes chaos
arts.sum: Referee Anthony Taylor called together captains Sam Morsy and Bruno Fernandes shortly before the end of the first half to inform them that technology could not be used

arts.ttl: Why is Ed Sheeran an Ipswich fan? Pop star attends Premier League game against Manchester United
arts.sum: Portman Road, the home of Ipswich Town, may not have the same glamour associated with it as other sporting venues around the globe, but it’s good enough for pop superstar Ed Sheeran, who is in the stands for Sunday’s game against Manchester United. Speaking to the club’s website after his acquisition was announced, Sheeran said: “I am really excited to have bought a small percentage of my home town football club.

arts.ttl: Ipswich v Man Utd team news: Amad, Garnacho + Rashford start
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim takes his team to Portman Road The post Ipswich v Man Utd team news: Amad, Garnacho + Rashford start appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Ruben Amorim names first Man Utd XI with three changes made for Ipswich
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim takes charge of Manchester United for the first time in the Premier League as the Red Devils make the trip to Portman Road to take on Ipswich Town and former coach Kieran McKenna
